```py
EXECsp_execute_external_script
          @language = N'R'
          ,@script = N'
                      library(RevoScaleR)
    df_sql <- InputDataSet 
                      var_info <- rxGetInfo(df_sql)
                      OutputDataSet <- data.frame(unlist(var_info))'
                      ,@input_data_1 = N'
    SELECT 
                       BusinessEntityID
                      ,[Name]
                      ,SalesPersonID
                      FROM [Sales].[Store]'
```
